class.name: TrainPart
class.brief_description: Basic class of the train part.
class.description: A base class for creating a specialized behaviours of the train. Provides shortcuts for most important methods.

method.name: broadcast_command
method.description: Broadcast command to all trains (including the train, which part belongs to)

method.name: get_mover_state
method.description: Returns dictionary ov properties with values from iternal mover

method.name: register_command
method.description: Registers command for train controlled by this node. This is a shortcut for [method TrainSystem.register_command].

method.name: send_command
method.description: Sends command to the train, which part belongs to.

method.name: unregister_command
method.description: Removes command of a train controlled by this node from the registry. This is a shortcut for [method TrainSystem.unregister_command].

method.name: update_mover
method.description: Performs update on an iternal mover of [TrainController]

members.member: If true, this train part will be processed by [TrainController] during updating and fetching a mover's state.

signal.name: config_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the internal config has changed

signal.name: enable_changed
signal.description: Train part status was enabled or disabled
